description:
**Fix Overview**:

To ensure optimal functionality of audio devices on Windows 10 and 11 machines:

1. Navigate to the Dell support site and locate the appropriate driver using the machine service tag for your specific device.
2. Download the latest version of the driver listed on the support site.
3. Remove the existing driver from your system.
4. Install the newly downloaded driver package to ensure it is correctly configured.

**Details**:
This process is essential to resolve any issues related to headphone detection or device functionality. By downloading the driver directly from the manufacturer, you ensure that the update is compatible and can help resolve potential conflicts with existing drivers. (LLM Synthesized)
